general: Today, dear Capricorn, the planets align to illuminate your eloquence. With the union of Mercury and Venus, you will find it easier to express yourself and obtain what you desire. It is the perfect time to claim better opportunities or compensations. The power of words and their ability to manifest will be heightened, so do not hesitate to articulate your wishes. Consider visualizing or writing your dreams with precision; it will help you bring them to fruition. Meanwhile, the Moon in Gemini and Chiron encourage you to express your love through thoughtful gestures towards your loved ones. However, be sure not to neglect your own goals, especially with the activation of Saturn later in the day. Finally, prepare for a beautiful romantic encounter when the Moon enters Cancer this evening.
love: Express your feelings sincerely to strengthen your bonds.
work: Seize the opportunity to negotiate to improve your professional situation.
health: Take the time to relax and meditate on your aspirations.
advice: Be bold in your requests and remain confident.
teaser: Express yourself and obtain what you desire.
